title: Legal Issues in Business
description:
The Module seeks to raise an awareness of common legal issues confronting business managers and discusses the optimal solutions that both the law and business can offer. The Module introduces you to the global and domestic
legal environment and to some of the legal risks involved. In the course of business, disputes are bound to arise and it is essential to know the avenues for dispute resolution, what law applies and where to resolve disputes in the most
expedient and cost-effective manner. Other essential topics relate to commercial contracts, international sales and e Commerce.
